update PAGY_FEE_CFG
PAGY_NO = #{pagyNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
START_TM = #{startTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
END_TM = #{endTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
CFG_DESC = #{cfgDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFG_TM = #{cfgTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
CFG_TLR_NO = #{cfgTlrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_UPD_TM = #{lstUpdTm,jdbcType=CHAR},
LST_UPD_TLR = #{lstUpdTlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CFG_ID = #{cfgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
